statements: DELETE FROM article_bias WHERE bias_type = 'political' AND confidence_level > 0.8;
DELETE FROM article_bias WHERE article_id = 20 AND bias_type = 'Political' AND confidence_level > 0.8;
DELETE FROM article_authors WHERE article_id = 1 AND author_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE bias_detected = TRUE AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM Sentiments WHERE article_id = 1 AND sentiment_type = 'positive';
DELETE FROM BiasAnalysis WHERE author_id = 3 AND bias_score > 0.5;
